### About this site

This website was generated in accordance with homework guidelines for the Data Science I course at Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health (P8150) taught by Dr. Jeff Goldsmith.

To produce the elements of this site, the tidyverse, plotly, and flexdashboard packages were utilized in R Studio. The site is hosted on [GitHub](https://github.com/miaisaacs), where the source code can also be found. 

Thank you for visiting this site and feel free to contact me using the e-mail link at the top of this page!
